-1.title: Brimstone talks 'Brimstone and The Borderhounds' at NYCC 2012
-1.plot: Rick Marshall talks with New York Comic Con celebrity guest, Brimstone about current projects including, Brimstone and the Borderhounds, Border-Pups, Crashbats, and Legends of Wrestling.

imdb.plot outline: Newsarama loves comics, action movies, sci-fi and TV shows no one watches. No, really. This makes us cooler than everyone. Newsarama has news, interviews, and exclusives. If it's too fantastic for words, were likely arguing about the finer points of it's coolness. Newsarama serves up a hearty helping of stories, blogs, video interviews, previews and trailers.
imdb.title: Newsarama
plot: _Newsarama_ (qv) loves comics, action movies, sci-fi and TV shows no one watches. No, really. This makes us cooler than everyone. _Newsarama_ (qv) has news, interviews, and exclusives. If it's too fantastic for words, were likely arguing about the finer points of it's coolness. _Newsarama_ (qv) serves up a hearty helping of stories, blogs, video interviews, previews and trailers.
